meanings.definition: A type of sea anemone with a cylindrical body and tentacles surrounding a central mouth.
meanings.sent1: The actinias swayed gently in the ocean currents, their colorful tentacles mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study actinias to learn more about marine life and ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The actinias decided to have a tentacle-twirling competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: The actinias danced gracefully in the water, like elegant ballerinas of the sea.
meanings.sent5: Children visiting the aquarium were amazed by the vibrant actinias waving in the tank.
